89cd8f91-2bd0-417e-8e2c-c4eeb2200f65.name: Rightsize - Potential Cost Increase
89cd8f91-2bd0-417e-8e2c-c4eeb2200f65.formula: ( max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|allocation|allocationBasedCpuBaseRate, depth=-2} ) > 0 ? ${this, metric=summary|undersized|vcpus} * max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|allocation|allocationBasedCpuBaseRate, depth=-2} ) : ${this, metric=Super Metric|sm_f969e72d-7775-44d7-973a-c92319fcd08b} * max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|cpuBaseRate, depth=-2} ) ) + ( max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|allocation|allocationBasedMemoryBaseRate, depth=-2} ) > 0 ? ( ${this, metric=summary|undersized|memory}/1024/1024 ) * max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|allocation|allocationBasedMemoryBaseRate, depth=-2} ) : ${this, metric=Super Metric|sm_bac94c64-ebd3-40a6-992e-7fd1b4d480b4} * max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|memoryBaseRate, depth=-2} ) )

c7b28474-211e-4173-8d55-d283ce26f764.name: Rightsize - Potential Memory Consumed Reclaimable (GB)
c7b28474-211e-4173-8d55-d283ce26f764.formula: ((${this, metric=mem|consumed_average} - (${this, metric=config|hardware|memoryKB} - ${this, metric=summary|oversized|memory})) > 0 ? (${this, metric=mem|consumed_average} - (${this, metric=config|hardware|memoryKB} - ${this, metric=summary|oversized|memory})) : 0)/1024/1024

0e3d6099-d2a3-49b4-8c65-b84aea91e0e7.name: Rightsize - Potential Cost Savings
0e3d6099-d2a3-49b4-8c65-b84aea91e0e7.formula: ( max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|allocation|allocationBasedCpuBaseRate, depth=-2} ) > 0 ? ${this, metric=summary|oversized|vcpus} * max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|allocation|allocationBasedCpuBaseRate, depth=-2} ) : ${this, metric=Super Metric|sm_ab378c76-0dce-4c09-ad8d-1c9ff8540882} * max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|cpuBaseRate, depth=-2} ) ) + ( max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|allocation|allocationBasedMemoryBaseRate, depth=-2} ) > 0 ? ( ${this, metric=summary|oversized|memory}/1024/1024 ) * max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|allocation|allocationBasedMemoryBaseRate, depth=-2} ) : ${this, metric=Super Metric|sm_c7b28474-211e-4173-8d55-d283ce26f764} * max( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=cost|memoryBaseRate, depth=-2} ) )
